description: Excavation of basement and formation of rear lightwell.
decision_conditions: <p><span id="docs-internal-guid-89977c91-7fff-9e71-b4fe-9cf87ba31fe9"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.28;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to the commencement of works a scheme for the provision and implementation of flood resilient and resistant construction details and measures for the site against surface water (overland flow) flood risk shall be submitted to and approved, in writing with the Local Planning Authority in consultation with the LLFA. The scheme shall be carried out in its entirety and; constructed and completed in accordance with the approved plans in line with current best practices.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.28;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.28;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: In the interests of reducing the opportunity for flooding on site and the surrounding area.</span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
